::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer runs up to Scattershot, panting heavily. He also transforms and 
takes out his gun.

"Anyone alive for us to kill?" he asks, looking at the crashed ship.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike throws a laser cutter aside in frustration. He and Reptilica 
have been mining energon for the past several hours, and mining in his beast 
mode was getting frustrating.

"Do we have to mine? This sucks!" He complains to Reptilica.

"This was the last thing Zardus ordered us to do," Reptilica says, looking 
up, "And I'm not gonna sit around the base getting bored, so shut up and get 
back to work."

Bloodystrike walks over, picks up a cutter, and goes back to work, grumbling 
to himself.
